meaningMnemonic: That <radical>scarecrow</radical> with the <radical>knife</radical> is the <kanji>vice</kanji> president. Yeah, I know how he looks, and I'm pretty sure he does some murdering on the <kanji>side</kanji>, but you didn't hear that from me.
readingMnemonic: It's the <kanji>vice</kanji> president's turn to speak at the podium and he just clears his throat and yells, "<reading>F**k</reading> (ふく) you!" to the crowd, holding up his knife. They cheer.
